title: MakerBot releases Android app for controlling 3D printers | Trusted Reviews
description: ![makerbot androidapp]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * 3D printing promised to be the next big thing in gadgets, letting us all makeour own objects. But so far, high prices and overcomplicated machines havekept it a niche pursuit. We’ve seen a few [moreaffordable](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sculptify-david-makes-3d-printing-more-affordable) machines lately. Hopefully they will helpit achieve mainstream success.The Royal Mail also [trialled a 3D printingservice](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/royal-mail-to-trial-in-branch-3d-printing-services) at its central London delivery office.
